question: For resistance to Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Platinum Doublet')

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Abemaciclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Abemaciclib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Abemaciclib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'estrogen-receptor' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'positive' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Abemaciclib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Methotrexate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Methotrexate'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Methotrexate')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Methotrexate')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Abiraterone Acetate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Abiraterone Acetate'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Abiraterone Acetate')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Abiraterone Acetate')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neuroblastoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Crizotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('MEK Inhibitor RO4987655')
RETURN

  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('R3Mab')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,

  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

question: In Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma, what therapies target genes causing resistance to Brigatinib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Brigatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Brigatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Brigatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Brigatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Imatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Imatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Methotrexate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Methotrexate'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Methotrexate')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Methotrexate')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Lenalidomide')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Erlotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Mercaptopurine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Mercaptopurine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Mercaptopurine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 't-cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Mercaptopurine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Selumetinib in Melanoma.
cypher:

  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Selumetinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Larotrectinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Cytarabine in Acute Myeloid Leukemia, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Cytarabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cytarabine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cytarabine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Cytarabine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Dasatinib')

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Thioguanine in T-cell Lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Thioguanine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Thioguanine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Thioguanine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 't-cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Thioguanine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In Melanoma, what therapies target genes causing resistance to PLX4720?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('PLX4720')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PLX4720'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('PLX4720')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )

WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('PLX4720')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Asparaginase'))

)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Asparaginase')

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Cetuximab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cetuximab'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cetuximab')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Cetuximab')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Taxane Compound'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Taxane Compound')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Taxane Compound')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('CDK4/6 Inhibition')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('CDK4/6 Inhibition'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('CDK4/6 Inhibition')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('CDK4/6 Inhibition')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Axitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Axitinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Axitinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Axitinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Vemurafenib in Pancreatic Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Vemurafenib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Gemcitabine in Ca Body Of Pancreas.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Gemcitabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gemcitabine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gemcitabine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Gemcitabine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastrointestinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stromal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Larotrectinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
